org.mini2Dx.miniscript.core

Class GameScriptingEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.miniscript.core.GameScriptingEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroovyGameScriptingEngine, LuaGameScriptingEngine, PythonGameScriptingEngine, RubyGameScriptingEngine

    public abstract class GameScriptingEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Provides scripting functionality to your game Note that this is a base class for each scripting language implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static GameScriptingEngine MOST_RECENT_INSTANCE
      Returns the most recently created GameScriptingEngine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScriptingEngine()
      Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool with the maximum amount of concurrent scripts set to the amount of processors + 1.

      Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool with the maximum amount of concurrent scripts set to the amount of processors + 1.
      GameScriptingEngine(int maxConcurrentScripts)
      Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool.
      GameScriptingEngine(int maxConcurrentScripts, boolean sandboxed)
      Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool.

    • Field Detail

      • MOST_RECENT_INSTANCE

        public static GameScriptingEngine MOST_RECENT_INSTANCE
        Returns the most recently created GameScriptingEngine

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScriptingEngine

        public GameScriptingEngine()
        Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool with the maximum amount of concurrent scripts set to the amount of processors + 1. Sandboxing is enabled if the implementation supports it.

      • GameScriptingEngine

        public GameScriptingEngine(int maxConcurrentScripts)
        Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool. Sandboxing is enabled if the implementation supports it.
        Parameters:
        maxConcurrentScripts - The maximum amount of concurrently running scripts. WARNING: this is a 'requested' amount and may be less due to the amount of available processors on the player's machine.

      • GameScriptingEngine

        public GameScriptingEngine(boolean sandboxed)
        Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool with the maximum amount of concurrent scripts set to the amount of processors + 1.
        Parameters:
        sandboxed - True if script sandboxing should be enabled

      • GameScriptingEngine

        public GameScriptingEngine(int maxConcurrentScripts,
                   boolean sandboxed)
        Constructs a scripting engine backed by a thread pool.
        Parameters:
        maxConcurrentScripts - The maximum amount of concurrently running scripts. WARNING: this is a 'requested' amount and may be less due to the amount of available processors on the player's machine.
        sandboxed - True if script sandboxing should be enabled

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Shuts down the thread pool and cleans up resources

      • isSandboxingSupported

        public abstract boolean isSandboxingSupported()
        Checks if sandboxing is supported by the GameScriptingEngine implementation
        Returns:
        True if sandboxing is supported

      • createScriptExecutorPool

        protected abstract ScriptExecutorPool<?> createScriptExecutorPool(int poolSize,
                                             boolean sandboxing)

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates all GameFutures
        Parameters:
        delta - The time (in seconds) since the last frame update

      • run

        public void run()
        This should not be invoked by the developer. Call update(float) instead.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • skipAllScripts

        public void skipAllScripts()
        Skips all currently running scripts

      • skipScript

        public void skipScript(int scriptId)
        Skips a currently running script
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The ID of the script to skip

      • skipAllGameFutures

        public void skipAllGameFutures()
        Skips all currently running GameFutures

      • compileScript

        public int compileScript(java.lang.String scriptContent)
                  throws InsufficientCompilersException
        Compiles a script for execution. Note it is best to call this sequentially before any script executions to avoid throwing a InsufficientCompilersException
        Parameters:
        scriptContent - The text contents of the script
        Returns:
        The unique id for the script
        Throws:
        InsufficientCompilersException - Thrown if there are no script compilers available

      • compileScript

        public int compileScript(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                  throws InsufficientCompilersException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Compiles a script for execution. Note it is best to call this sequentially before any script executions to avoid throwing a InsufficientCompilersException
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The InputStream to read the script contents from
        Returns:
        The unique id for the script
        Throws:
        InsufficientCompilersException - Thrown if there are no script compilers available
        java.io.IOException - Throw if the InputStream could not be read or closed

      • invokeCompiledScript

        public void invokeCompiledScript(int scriptId,
                        ScriptBindings scriptBindings)
        Queues a compiled script for execution in the engine's thread pool
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The id of the script to run
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script

      • invokeCompiledScript

        public void invokeCompiledScript(int scriptId,
                        ScriptBindings scriptBindings,
                        ScriptInvocationListener invocationListener)
        Queues a compiled script for execution in the engine's thread pool
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The id of the script to run
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script
        invocationListener - A ScriptInvocationListener to list for invocation results

      • invokeScript

        public int invokeScript(java.lang.String scriptContent,
               ScriptBindings scriptBindings)
                 throws InsufficientCompilersException
        Compiles and queues a script for execution in the engine's thread pool
        Parameters:
        scriptContent - The text content of the script
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script
        Returns:
        The unique id for the script
        Throws:
        InsufficientCompilersException - Thrown if there are no script compilers available

      • invokeScript

        public int invokeScript(java.lang.String scriptContent,
               ScriptBindings scriptBindings,
               ScriptInvocationListener invocationListener)
                 throws InsufficientCompilersException
        Compiles and queues a script for execution in the engine's thread pool
        Parameters:
        scriptContent - The text content of the script
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script
        invocationListener - A ScriptInvocationListener to list for invocation results
        Returns:
        The unique id for the script
        Throws:
        InsufficientCompilersException - Thrown if there are no script compilers available

      • invokeCompiledScriptLocally

        public void invokeCompiledScriptLocally(int scriptId,
                               ScriptBindings scriptBindings)
        Executes a compiled script immediately on the thread calling this method. Warning: If no ScriptExecutors are available this will block until one is available
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The script id
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script

      • invokeCompiledScriptLocally

        public void invokeCompiledScriptLocally(int scriptId,
                               ScriptBindings scriptBindings,
                               ScriptInvocationListener invocationListener)
        Executes a compiled script immediately on the thread calling this method. Warning: If no ScriptExecutors are available this will block until one is available
        Parameters:
        scriptId - The script id
        scriptBindings - The variable bindings for the script
        invocationListener - A ScriptInvocationListener to list for invocation results

      • setCancelReallocatedFutures

        public void setCancelReallocatedFutures(boolean cancelReallocatedFutures)
        Sets if newly GameFutures should cancel a previously scheduled GameFuture with the same ID. IDs attempt be unique but if there are GameFutures that never complete IDs may come into conflict after millions of generated GameFutures. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        cancelReallocatedFutures - True if existing GameFutures with same ID should be cancelled
